pkgmetadata.longdescription: flt===**fast Legendre transform**This is a minimal Python package for fast discrete Legendre transforms (DLTs).The implementation uses a recursive version of the matrix relations by Alpert &Rokhlin (1991) to compute the DLT via a discrete cosine transform (DCT).The package can be installed using pip: pip install fltFor more information, please see the [documentation].Current functionality covers the absolutely minimal use case. Please open anissue on GitHub if you would like to see anything added.[documentation]: https://cltools.readthedocs.io/flt/
